com.bham.bd.entity.ai.navigation

Interface NavigationService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PathPlanner

    public interface NavigationService
    The interface of path finding for agents

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean createRequest(GameCharacter entity)
      Create a path finding request and register it in the time slice service
      boolean createRequest(ItemType itemType)
      Create a path finding request and a Dijkstra instance and register it in the time slice service Note: This function is not a searching function, it only register a request
      boolean createRequest(Point2D targetPos)
      Create a path finding request and an AStar instance register it in the time slice service Note: This function is not a searching function, it only register a request
      LinkedList<PathEdge> getPath()
      called by an agent after it has been notified that a search has terminated successfully.
      boolean isTriggerActive()
      check if the item is active or not
      SearchStatus peekRequestStatus()
      called by an agent after a request was created
      void render(GraphicsContext gc)
      For debug Render the path stored in the path planner if the search task had completed
      void resetToNoTask()
      Resets the search status to no_task.
      void setExpandCondition(ExpandPolicies.ExpandCondition expandCondition)
      set expand condition for algorithm.

    • Method Detail

      • createRequest

        boolean createRequest(ItemType itemType)
        Create a path finding request and a Dijkstra instance and register it in the time slice service Note: This function is not a searching function, it only register a request
        Parameters:
        itemType - for example, triggers
        Returns:
        true if there been a graph node around bot, otherwise false

      • createRequest

        boolean createRequest(Point2D targetPos)
        Create a path finding request and an AStar instance register it in the time slice service Note: This function is not a searching function, it only register a request
        Parameters:
        targetPos - the targetPos that the bot wants to reach
        Returns:
        true if closest nodes exist around both bot and targetPosition, otherwise false

      • createRequest

        boolean createRequest(GameCharacter entity)
        Create a path finding request and register it in the time slice service
        Parameters:
        entity - the character an agent wants to reach
        Returns:
        true if closest nodes exist around both bot and targetPosition, otherwise false

      • peekRequestStatus

        SearchStatus peekRequestStatus()
        called by an agent after a request was created
        Returns:
        SearchStatus to indicate searching process

      • resetToNoTask

        void resetToNoTask()
        Resets the search status to no_task. This is useful to not repeat the searches after target was found

      • getPath

        LinkedList<PathEdge> getPath()
        called by an agent after it has been notified that a search has terminated successfully.
        Returns:
        a list of PathEdge

      • setExpandCondition

        void setExpandCondition(ExpandPolicies.ExpandCondition expandCondition)
        set expand condition for algorithm. It will also reset the one inside algorithm.
        Parameters:
        expandCondition - seeExpandPolicies

      • isTriggerActive

        boolean isTriggerActive()
        check if the item is active or not
        Returns:
        true if the item is active

      • render

        void render(GraphicsContext gc)
        For debug Render the path stored in the path planner if the search task had completed
        Parameters:
        gc -
